description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Sleepwalker is a family friendly game where the goal is to guide your character safely back into bed.  Using very simple controls, you must help the sleepwalker navigate through a variety of obstacles and challenges.  Levels are a combination of timing, dexterity and puzzle solving.
